openscap.profile_description: This profile defines a baseline that aligns to the "Level 1 - Workstation" configuration from the Center for Internet Security® Red Hat Enterprise Linux 10 Benchmark™, v1.0.0, released 2025-08-27.  This profile includes Center for Internet Security® Red Hat Enterprise Linux 10 CIS Benchmarks™ content.
openscap.profile_name: CIS Red Hat Enterprise Linux 10 Benchmark for Level 1 - Workstation
